meanings.def: a group of people who sing together, for example in church services or public performances
examples: She sings in the school choir.
He joined the church choir when he was eight.
The children's choir will perform some Christmas songs.
She sings in the church choir.
a massed choir of local schoolchildren
two of the girls in the choir

meanings.def: the part of a church where the choir sits during services
to speak to people in support of views that they already hold
examples: I realize I may be preaching to the choir, but I think he's gorgeous.
